0P000024OE.F.summary: Long term capital growth through exposure to commodities markets focusing mainly on precious metals. The Company will invest in Commodity markets focusing mainly on Precious Metal markets, namely gold, silver and platinum and any other metals that in the future may be considered âpreciousâ by the markets. Investment in the Precious Metals markets will be achieved by investing directly in gold, silver or platinum through Precious Metal Depots or by investing indirectly in Precious Metals (including, but not limited to, gold, silver or platinum) through Precious Metal Accounts or certificates representing Precious Metals.

0P0000UH2C.F.summary: The Argentum Fund (Ireland) plc. Is an accumulating fund under Irish Law with a very high quote of allocated Silver (>95%). Investment objective is to achieve long-term capital growth and to track the benchmark London Silver Fixing in Euro.
